Name: Scale Enchanter
About the game: Build musical scales easily with this minimalist puzzle game . Designed for music theory students of all levels (if you know the rules about building scales you're on): Featuring 11 different types of scales to train (from major to phrygian scales) More than 150 scales to build Easy to play: drag the card to the blank spot and test the scale Music theory accuracy: You can apply the scale building here in real life Simple and minimalist art Support for letter and syllabic notations for note names Do you have what it takes to build all scales?
